x_symbol.description: Determine if two elements intersect and if so determine the intersecting rectangle.

par.name: obj
par.note: Optional. If provided, obj will have the following properties assigned: x, y, w and h. They describe the intersected rectangle.

x_symbol.return: Returns true if the two elements intersect and assigns properties to obj which describe the intersected rectangle: x, y, w, and h.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: finished porting to X ;-) thanks Nick

rev.author: mf
rev.note: put in it's own file for use with XC
